Review Text: На данный момент для меня это стало лучшем приложением в заучивании Корана. Особенно очень удобно в аудио указать сколько именно аятов тебе надо сколько раз они будут повторяться , а так же сколько раз будет повторятся каждый аят. А так же очень удобно что есть перевод каждого отдельного слова, что позволяет брать глаголы и так же изучать слова по отдельно юсти для использования в разговоре
translation: At the moment, this has become the best application for memorizing the Quran for me. It is especially convenient to indicate in the audio exactly how many verses you need, how many times they will be repeated, as well as how many times each verse will be repeated. It’s also very convenient that there is a translation of each individual word, which allows you to take verbs and also study words separately for use in conversation

Review Text: Assalamu alaikum. Despite the fact that this time i'm coming back with a complain am not changing the star rate. I noticed that when you select a single surah sometimes, a first letter or a part of it is omitted by the app (e.g Qur'an 16 verse 106,) there is a و there that is omitted. Please try and adjust the audio. Secondly, why is it that the 'classic madani mushaf' type doesn't have the tajweed features and you can't select a word to see translation alone? Thank you, & may Allah bless you.
translation: Assalamu alaikum. Despite the fact that this time i'm coming back with a complain am not changing the star rate. I noticed that when you select a single surah sometimes, a first letter or a part of it is omitted by the app (e.g Qur'an 16 verse 106,) there is a و there that is omitted. Please try and adjust the audio. Secondly, why is it that the 'classic madani mushaf' type doesn't have the tajweed features and you can't select a word to see translation alone? Thank you, & may Allah bless you.

Review Text: Denna app är fantastisk och användbar, jättebra för de som vill förstå vissa svårare ord i Koranen till enklare språk. Du kan lägga upp en plan på ex antal dagar för att uppnå ditt mål när det kommer till att läsa, man får helt enkelt någon typ av motivation, någon känsla som får dig vilja komma in i appen för att utforska/lära mer om Koranen. Rekommenderar starkt!
translation: This app is amazing and useful, great for those who want to understand some more difficult words in the Quran in simpler language. You can set up a plan of e.g. number of days to achieve your goal when it comes to reading, you simply get some type of motivation, some feeling that makes you want to enter the app to explore/learn more about the Koran. Highly recommend!

Review Text: Last year, I had the urge of memorizing sura yasin. I started searching for something by use of which I could hear one specific ayah repeatedly until I unconsciously learn it by heart. Yt has some videos but clicking the "play on again" was discouraging. At that time I download multiple apps from playstore and Alhamdulillah, for me this app was the best among them. This year, I am using the same technique to memorize "sura ar rahman".

Review Text: القرآن الكريم كتاب الله يحب الإعتناء به بالنسبة للتطبيق يوجد صعوبة في البحث عن الكل… بل لم أستطع البحث عن كلمة في القرأن البرنامج متداخل غير منظم يجب أن يعطيني الأيات بشكل قائمة أثناء البحث لأدخل عليها وأختار ما أريد من بحث أو اعراب او تفسير و كل في قسمه او في آيته على الاقل وفي صفحة واحدة … لحد الان لم استطع البحث عن كلمة في القرأن العربي… ما اعجبني انه يحوي الاعراب الذي يجب ان يكون تفصيليا والترجمة وجذور الكلمات والكلام يطول البحث في الأيات لم استطع الوصول اليه بل يعطي نتائج من التفسير… البرنا
translation: The Holy Qur’an is a book that God loves to take care of. As for the application, there is difficulty in searching for everything...in fact, I could not search for a word in the Qur’an. The program is intertwined and disorganized. It must give me the verses in a list during the search so that I can enter them and choose what I want from research, parsing, or interpretation, and all in Its part, or in its verse at least, and on one page... Until now, I have not been able to search for a word in the Arabic Qur’an... What I liked is that it contains the parsing, which must be detailed, the translation, and the roots of the words, and the speech takes a long time searching the verses, but I have not been able to reach it, but it gives results from the interpretation... Al-Barna.

Review Text: জীবনের সব থেকে ভালো কাজ আপনার, এই কোরানের apps টি। আমি আপনাকে মুখ থেকে দোয়া দেইনা। অন্তর থেকে দোয়া চলে যায়। আমি এখনো মনে করি একটি জিনিস কম আছে, সেটা হলো - আরবির উচ্চারণ বাংলায়। নূরে হেদায়া ফন্ট দেয়ার পর আমার মনে স্থান করেছেন। থিম কাস্টোমাইস করার option টি যোগ করবেন। আপনারা অনেক করেছেন, তবুও আমার আরও চাওয়া হয়তো বেশি হয়ে গেলো। আল্লাহ আপনাকে আপনার টিমকে দুনিয়া, আখিরাতে উত্তম যাঝা দান করেন। আমি আমার সাধ্য মতো আপনাদের সাথে শরিক হতে পেরেছি তার জন্য নিজেকে ধন্য মনে করি। হে আল্লাহ আপনি আমাকে ক্ষমা করেন

Not to mention the great selection of Qari's and tafseers. Great app.

The translation of the words simply by clicking on them while reading is very useful, even as an Arab myself when i come across hard words that i can't understand and the planner section is a unique game changer for me. Not to mention the great selection of Qari's and tafseers. Great app.

Review Text: Very good app mashallah. I love the personalisation options regarding page viewing preferences, script, translation, and design, etc. Only cons I can think of right now, are that the Arabic of the tafseer (be it spelling or harakat) is sometimes incorrect, and secondly that the ayah player doesn't work on my phone (Pixel 6 pro), even after de- and installing, but I've seen it working on a friends' iPhone.
translation: Very good app mashallah. I love the personalisation options regarding page viewing preferences, script, translation, and design, etc. Only cons I can think of right now, are that the Arabic of the tafseer (be it spelling or harakat) is sometimes incorrect, and secondly that the ayah player doesn't work on my phone (Pixel 6 pro), even after de- and installing, but I've seen it working on a friends' iPhone.

Review Text: Great App. Jazakallah. I'm a developer too. As a User, I really appreciate this app's functionality and UI. Please fix some issue 1. User need to click both translation and Tafsir check box. Please add that, only Tafsir/Translation can be read also. 2. Looping a verse is great feature for learning Quran faster. But sometimes looping not working as expected. For example, if user select 5 time, the verse sometimes runs more than 5. 3. After loops, next verse should resume playing.
translation: Great App. Jazakallah. I'm a developer too. As a User, I really appreciate this app's functionality and UI. Please fix some issue 1. User need to click both translation and Tafsir check box. Please add that, only Tafsir/Translation can be read also. 2. Looping a verse is great feature for learning Quran faster. But sometimes looping not working as expected. For example, if user select 5 time, the verse sometimes runs more than 5. 3. After loops, next verse should resume playing.

Review Text: এক কথায় অসাধারণ অ্যাপস। বাংলা ভাষায় এত সুন্দর আল কুরআন অ্যাপস আমি দেখি নাই। অ্যাপসটি ব্যবহার করতে ফোনে কোন সমস্যা হয় না। শাব্দিক অর্থ এবং একইসাথে একাধিক অনুবাদ, তাফসীর, একাধিক ক্বারির তিলাওয়াত শুনার অপশন এবং বিষয়ভিত্তিক সেভ করে রাখার অপশন অ্যাপসটিকে অতুলনীয় করে তুলেছে। মুমিনদের পবিত্র কুরআন থেকে সহজে উপকার পেতে এই অ্যাপসটি সবার ফোনে থাকা উচিত। যারা এই অক্লান্ত পরিশ্রম করে আল কুরআন অ্যাপসটি তৈরি করেছেন আল্লাহ তাদের কবুল করুন। জাযাকুমুল্লাহু খইরান।
translation: In short, great apps. I have not seen such beautiful Al Quran apps in Bengali language. There is no problem on the phone to use the apps. Literal meaning and multiple translations simultaneously, Tafseer, option to listen to multiple Qari recitations and thematic saving options make the app unmatched. All believers should have this app on their phone to get benefit from the Holy Quran easily. May Allah accept those who made this Al Quran app by working tirelessly. Jazakumullahu Khairan.

Review Text: I take this Quran app as a personal Ramadan gift of Allah, SWT, to me. I had used several Quran apps which were excellent but at some point in time got disappointed. Always wanting to get back to it, i mean you could even challenge yourself and race with the system. Simply put, i love AI Quran. Jazakumullahu khairan. Barakallahu feekum

translation: 4 stars as I hope to add Arabic translation for the words besides the other languages. I hope to provide a translation of the same meaning of the words in Arabic as well, in addition to other languages, so that we do not resort to a linguistic dictionary to translate the meaning of the word from English to Arabic again due to the presence of some words that some readers do not understand. Just know the meaning of the word's translation in English

Review Text: Ассаляму алейкум! Плюс можно послушать именно того Аята, котрого хотелось бы узнать как именно правильно нужно произнести. А когда выходишь из программы, то всё равно можно найти Аят и Суру, на которых ты остановился, даже спустя много часов. В общем всё прекрасно, спасибо разработчикам, да вознаградит вас всех Всевышний 🤍

Plus, you can listen to exactly that Ayat that you would like to know exactly how to pronounce correctly. And when you exit the program, you can still find the Ayat and Surah you stopped at, even after many hours. In general, everything is fine, thanks to the developers, may the Almighty reward you all 🤍

Review Text: আলহামদুলিল্লাহ এই অ্যাপসটি আমি দীর্ঘদিন যাবত ব্যবহার করছি দিনের এক অসাধারণ খেদমত। উত্তম প্রতিদান রব আপনাদের দান করুন। দুটি বিষয় তেলাওয়াত এর ক্ষেত্রে কারী সব সময় সিলেক্টেড থাকে না। সিলেক্ট করে দিলে বারবার চেঞ্জ হয়ে যায় এবং আরেকটি এরাবিক ফন্ট নির্দিষ্ট জায়গায় লক করার অপশন দিতে হবে, অপ্রত্যাশিত টাচ লেগে বারবার সাইজ পরিবর্তন হয়ে যায়।

Review Text: I'll add 1 * later. This Al-Qur'an application is great! I've been using it for many years, and I enjoy reading it every single day. However, 1 issue I've encountered is that the footnotes without content are not clickable. It would be great if the developers could make them clickable or add content to the blank footnotes. This way, it would be easier to see where those footnotes refer to and read them quickly without closing the current verse we're reading in the translation section. Thank you.
translation: I'll add 1 * later. This Al-Qur'an application is great! I've been using it for many years, and I enjoy reading it every single day. However, 1 issue I've encountered is that the footnotes without content are not clickable. It would be great if the developers could make them clickable or add content to the blank footnotes. This way, it would be easier to see where those footnotes refer to and read them quickly without closing the current verse we're reading in the translation section. Thank you.

Review Text: This app is really amazing. The best engine to explore Quran. Thank you. I encourage people to contribute to this project with whatever they can. I have also an improvement request to do regarding the option of copy paste. I have always several translations activated and I often share them in diferent platforms. The issue is that when I try to copy only one of the translations it copies all, including the original text in arabic. It would be better if I could copy only what I need. Not the pack.
translation: This app is really amazing. The best engine to explore Quran. Thank you. I encourage people to contribute to this project with whatever they can. I have also an improvement request to do regarding the option of copy paste. I have always several translations activated and I often share them in diferent platforms. The issue is that when I try to copy only one of the translations it copies all, including the original text in arabic. It would be better if I could copy only what I need. Not the pack.

Review Text: AWAS ada beberapa ayat terjemahan ke bahasa Indonesia yang diselewengkan dalam tafsir Ibnu Kathir didalam aplikasi ini. Seperti menukar makna perkataan kepada yang berlawanan. Contoh menghapuskan perkataan (لا nafi dan nahi /tidak/jangan) dari ayat yang di terjemahkan ke bahasa Indonesia. Ini menjadikan perkara yang dilarang kepada yang dibolihkan. Perkara yg tidak berlaku kepada telah berlaku. AWAS AWAS
translation: BEWARE there are some verses translated into Indonesian that are distorted in Ibnu Kathir's interpretation in this application. Like changing the meaning of a word to the opposite. Example of removing the words (لا nafi and nahi / don't / don't) from sentences translated into Indonesian. This turns the forbidden into a reversed one. Things that didn't happen have happened. CAUTION CAUTION

Review Text: Alhamdulillah, this is a very user-friendly and well-designed Qur'an app. I appreciate the range of recitations we get to listen to, the comprehensive Tafsir notes, and the systematic word-by-word translation option, which is especially helpful if you're learning Arabic. May Allah reward the app designers abundantly 🤲🏾

May Allah reward the app designers abundantly 🤲🏾

Review Text: The app provides an advanced experience in presenting the Quran. I recommend developing the library into different fonts, tafser, translation of meanings, occasions. Developing other modules, i.e Hadith, etc. I advise you to create an API for presenting materials for new developers. Muslims must change the way of thinking from creation to sustainability, rather than replicating the same work in every app. In conclusion, the app interface and experience is so wonderful.
translation: The app provides an advanced experience in presenting the Quran. I recommend developing the library into different fonts, tafser, translation of meanings, occasions. Developing other modules, i.e Hadith, etc. I advise you to create an API for presenting materials for new developers. Muslims must change the way of thinking from creation to sustainability, rather than replicating the same work in every app. In conclusion, the app interface and experience is so wonderful.

Review Text: War mal sehr gut wird aber immer Schlechter Anfangs gab es noch 4 Verschiedene "Übersetzungen " ins Deutsche was sehr praktisch war da man dadurch schön erkennen konnte das es verschiedene Interpretationen der Übersetzung gibt und dies einem ein Unverfälschteres Bild des Qurans geb . Heute gibt es nur noch 2 Teilweise Übersetzungen .Dazu kommt das es anfangs 2 oder 3 verschiedene Tafsiere gab jetzt auf Deutsch kein eines Mehr.Die App entwickelt sich zurück und ist fast unbrauchbar geworden.
translation: It used to be very good but it's getting worse. At the beginning there were 4 different "translations" into German, which was very practical because you could see that there were different interpretations of the translation and that this gave you a more unadulterated picture of the Quran. Today there are only 2 partial translations. In addition, there were initially 2 or 3 different tafsieres. Now there is no one in German. The app is developing backwards and has become almost unusable.

Bir emeğin hakkını nasıl zayi ediyorsunuz. 5 yıldız verince cebinizden para mı çıkıyor. Ya da 3 yıldız verince istediğin hocanın sesini mi yüklüyorlar hemen. burda bir dünya seçenek var, birisi 3 yıldız vermiş uygulamaya sırf her zaman dinlediği hoca yok diye. Yazık ve de ayıp. Kul hakkıdır bu yaptığınız. Ben çok beğendim...

How do you waste the rights of labor? Do you lose money when you give 5 stars? Or when you give 3 stars, do they immediately upload the voice of the teacher you want? There are a world of options here, someone gave the application 3 stars just because there is no teacher he always listens to. It's a shame and a shame. What you are doing is a person's right. I liked it very much...

Review Text: As someone who tried many quran apps and never reviewed one,this is the best ! Jazakumu Allahu khairan!

Review Text: This is a great app. I enjoy using for Tajweed, praying nawafil with it; I like the predefined Ruku option. I don't know the Quran by heart, so stopping at the end of the context makes sense, instead of stopping randomly and missing the point from the previous Ayats. I like that it offers different options of translation and tafsir. The Wor-by-Word option allows me to scan the meaning of the words that I don't understand without interrupting my recitation flow. I'll more feedback/ideas soon
translation: This is a great app. I enjoy using for Tajweed, praying nawafil with it; I like the predefined Ruku option. I don't know the Quran by heart, so stopping at the end of the context makes sense, instead of stopping randomly and missing the point from the previous Ayats. I like that it offers different options of translation and tafsir. The Wor-by-Word option allows me to scan the meaning of the words that I don't understand without interrupting my recitation flow. I'll more feedback/ideas soon

Review Text: أعتقد أن أكثر ما يميز هذا التطبيق هو القاموس القرآني للكلمات بالجذر و الجذع.. رائع جدا و كنت أتمنى إضافة الجذور الثنائية وفتح نافذة للمراجعة و الملاحظات لتنبيه المتابع بوجود آراء أخرى حول مرجعية الكلمة للجذر. فمثلا بعض القواميس ترجع كلمة (أمائكم) لجذر (أمم) و تفصل جذر (أيي) إلى أكثر من جذر بخلاف نهج هذا القاموس.
translation: I think that the most distinctive feature of this application is the Qur’anic dictionary of words with roots and stems... very wonderful, and I was hoping to add double roots and open a window for review and notes to alert the follower to the presence of other opinions about the word’s reference to the root. For example, some dictionaries return the word (your mothers) to the root (nations) and separate the root (ayy) into more than one root, contrary to the approach of this dictionary.

Review Text: my quran hifz journey is mainly coz of this app..suggestions:juzz3 goes blank midway..pl look into this..2.when I select some aayahs eg from 121 to 150 in baqara and if I pause to search for something else on phone eg youtube ..then when I resume the aayahs it doesn't end at my selected ayah which is 150 but keeps on proceeding to next ayahs..3)eg I select v 120 to 125 on loop to memorize..if v123 is v hard for me,give opt where only v123 can be put on repeat not the remaining selected verses.
translation: my quran hifz journey is mainly coz of this app..suggestions:juzz3 goes blank midway..pl look into this..2.when I select some aayahs eg from 121 to 150 in baqara and if I pause to search for something else on phone eg youtube ..then when I resume the aayahs it doesn't end at my selected ayah which is 150 but keeps on proceeding to next ayahs..3)eg I select v 120 to 125 on loop to memorize..if v123 is v hard for me,give opt where only v123 can be put on repeat not the remaining selected verses.

Review Text: As Salām ʿalaykum wa Rahmatullah. This app is for serious students who long to memorize, understand, and eventually teach Al Qur'an. Please pay attention to the vocabulary words, tafsir, and footnotes. Listen to the Qaris to help you correct your errors and recite clearer. Most importantly, remember, "The one who reads slowly gets double of the reward." So don't get emarrased or give up. In shaa Allah, you will recite Al Quran beautifully in a very short time if you remain steadfast. Peace!
translation: As Salām ʿalaykum wa Rahmatullah. This app is for serious students who long to memorize, understand, and eventually teach Al Qur'an. Please pay attention to the vocabulary words, tafsir, and footnotes. Listen to the Qaris to help you correct your errors and recite clearer. Most importantly, remember, "The one who reads slowly gets double of the reward." So don't get emarrased or give up. In shaa Allah, you will recite Al Quran beautifully in a very short time if you remain steadfast. Peace!

Review Text: Why almost each and every quranic app leaves so much gap in between Ayat in translations? Can't we make translations similar to the original arabic without putting the next Ayah in the next line ? A gapless translation reading mode is what I m talking about ,a pure translation reading mode is absolutely necessary without separating the Ayat in different lines ,this way the reading can be more fluent and easier,this can also help us to focus on what we are reading and not distracted between Ayat
translation: Why almost each and every quranic app leaves so much gap in between Ayat in translations? Can't we make translations similar to the original arabic without putting the next Ayah in the next line ? A gapless translation reading mode is what I m talking about ,a pure translation reading mode is absolutely necessary without separating the Ayat in different lines ,this way the reading can be more fluent and easier,this can also help us to focus on what we are reading and not distracted between Ayat

Review Text: MashaAllah this app is amazing the more I used it the more features I found. This app is great for regular recitation or hifdh(as it has a planner to choose how many days you would like to complete the Quran in and many recitation styles) and alimiyyah(as each word has a deeper explanation about the meaning and many tafseers). The app itself is very well designed. The only improvement is for the 13 line mushaf to be added and an edit option for the planners. Jazakallah Khair to the developers :)
translation: MashaAllah this app is amazing the more I used it the more features I found. This app is great for regular recitation or hifdh(as it has a planner to choose how many days you would like to complete the Quran in and many recitation styles) and alimiyyah(as each word has a deeper explanation about the meaning and many tafseers). The app itself is very well designed. The only improvement is for the 13 line mushaf to be added and an edit option for the planners. Jazakallah Khair to the developers :)

Review Text: Keren bgt, jujur baru kali ini ada aplikasi Al-Qur'an yang selengkap ini. Bukan hanya terjemah tapi ada tafsir nya, arti per kata, tanda tajwid di setiap huruf, jenis huruf tulisan Arab bisa di pilih, tema bisa ganti sesuai selera, audio murottal banyak pilihan suara dari imam-imam internasional. Dan semua gratissss. Terima kasih utk developer nya, insyaa allah ini akan jadi amal jariyah kalian semua yg sudah ikut andil membuat aplikasi bagus ini. Jazakallah khair.
translation: It's really cool, to be honest, this is the first time there is an application for the Koran that is as complete as this. Not only a translation but there is an interpretation, the meaning of each word, tajwid marks on each letter, you can choose the type of Arabic writing, you can change the theme according to your taste, there are many audio murottal choices of voices from international imams. And it's all free. Thank you to the developer, God willing, this will be a charity for all of you who have contributed to making this good application. Jazakallah khair.

Review Text: Absolutely love the word translations. Word by word translation, not only good for those aiming to learn Arabic for reading Quran, but also in general for English speaking people, who would like to understand the specific wording of an ayah. Amazing quality. And for a person who reads Quran in Arabic but may have forgotten one word, it helps to use the translation method provided by this app rather than needing to translate the full ayah. May Allah bless this app and its developers.
translation: Absolutely love the word translations. Word by word translation, not only good for those aiming to learn Arabic for reading Quran, but also in general for English speaking people, who would like to understand the specific wording of an ayah. Amazing quality. And for a person who reads Quran in Arabic but may have forgotten one word, it helps to use the translation method provided by this app rather than needing to translate the full ayah. May Allah bless this app and its developers.

Review Text: АсСаляму алейкум. В тафсирах перевода грубая ошибка. Нет бога, кроме Аллаха -это неправильный смысл. Правильный: Нет никого достойного поклонения, кроме Аллаха или Нет божества достойного поклонения,кроме Аллаха.Посланник Аллаха, да благословит его Аллах и приветствует, был послан к арабам язычникам,которые уже верили в Аллаха, НО они поклонялись помимо Аллаха другим идолам, лжебожествам. Также Посланник Аллаха, صلى لله عليه و سلم был послан ко всем людям до Судного Дня.
translation: Assalyamu alaikum. There is a gross error in the translation tafsir. There is no god but Allah - this is the wrong meaning. Correct: There is no one worthy of worship except Allah or There is no deity worthy of worship except Allah. The Messenger of Allah, may Allah bless him and grant him peace, was sent to the pagan Arabs who already believed in Allah, BUT they worshiped other idols and false deities besides Allah. Also the Messenger of Allah, صلى لله عليه و سلم was sent to all people until the Day of Judgment.

Review Text: For a long time now, the audio recitation has an issue. Every time you try to play it, it keeps requesting permission to delete audio file, and does not play even after deletion. This is an essential part of the app, please rectify. I found a workaround: delete the audio files manually and choose 'stream without downloading' in advanced settings.
translation: For a long time now, the audio recitation has an issue. Every time you try to play it, it keeps requesting permission to delete audio file, and does not play even after deletion. This is an essential part of the app, please rectify. I found a workaround: delete the audio files manually and choose 'stream without downloading' in advanced settings.
Developer Reply Text: Assalamu 'alaykum dear user. We would love to make your experience better in sha Allah. If you are still facing the same issues or have any feature requests, please provide your feedback on feedback.gtaf.org. JazakAllahu khayran.

Review Text: Selamlar. Gelmiş geçmiş en iyi Kur'an'ı Kerim uygulaması diyebilirim, hem az yer kaplıyor hem de arayüzü güzel. Dilleri, tefsirleri, tecvitli yazı şekli, temaları, kelimenin tek tek anlamı ve dilbiligisi detayları var. En önemlisi de Kur'an'ın dinlenebilir olması, birçok farklı imam var. İstediğimiz ayeti kopyalayabiliyoruz. Küçük uygulama büyük iş.
translation: Hello. I can say that it is the best Quran application ever, it takes up little space and has a nice interface. They have languages, interpretations, tajweed writing style, themes, word-by-word meaning and grammatical details. The most important thing is that the Quran can be listened to, there are many different imams. We can copy any verse we want. Small application, big job.

Review Text: Asalaam Aleikum. This is an absolutely amazing app. It has kept me engaged with it unlike any other Qur'an app. The UI is clean, fonts and colours are gentle on the eyes and beautiful to look at. I love the tafsir/note view layout. It is very cleverly structured in a way that helps provide as much info as possible about each ayat. And the tags are brilliant at pooling various ayats that contain a similar theme. May Allah reward you for this beautiful work and making this accessible everyone
translation: Asalaam Aleikum. This is an absolutely amazing app. It has kept me engaged with it unlike any other Qur'an app. The UI is clean, fonts and colours are gentle on the eyes and beautiful to look at. I love the tafsir/note view layout. It is very cleverly structured in a way that helps provide as much info as possible about each ayat. And the tags are brilliant at pooling various ayats that contain a similar theme. May Allah reward you for this beautiful work and making this accessible everyone

Review Text: Very nice app Allahumma barik. The section and ayah repetition feature is a big plus for me. However, I have to reduce the star to 3 as the repetition is not working as expected. If I sent 19 repeat or infinite repeat, the player never repeats the section. There is also an issue with the sync between the app player and the notification player. This has been going for 2 months, I think. Please fix it as it is very important for me to aid in what I am trying to achieve
translation: Very nice app Allahumma barik. The section and ayah repetition feature is a big plus for me. However, I have to reduce the star to 3 as the repetition is not working as expected. If I sent 19 repeat or infinite repeat, the player never repeats the section. There is also an issue with the sync between the app player and the notification player. This has been going for 2 months, I think. Please fix it as it is very important for me to aid in what I am trying to achieve

Review Text: Super application, très complète. On y retrouve plusieurs recitateurs avec une très bonne qualité sonore et ça fait plaisir de pouvoir en choisir plusieurs, dont certains très connus. Les traductions sont bien faites et en plusieurs langues. On peut changer la taille des textes et effectuer un suivi si on veut lire régulièrement le Coran. On peut aussi y trouver les tafsir d'Ibn Kathir. Merci beaucoup aux développeurs l'équipe derrière le développement de cette application! BaarakAllahu fikoum!
translation: Great application, very complete. There are several reciters with very good sound quality and it's nice to be able to choose several, including some very well known. The translations are well done and in several languages. You can change the size of the texts and follow up if you want to read the Quran regularly. We can also find the tafsir of Ibn Kathir there. Many thanks to the developers team behind the development of this app! BaarakAllahu fikoum!

Review Text: Un bonne application. Je la conseille à celui où celle qui veut lire ou apprendre le Saint Coran. Sauf qu'il y a une petite anomalie notée. Dans la répétition des versets, il arrive qu'une partie (une syllabe) du verset antérieur est prononcée dans le verset suivant. Je vous donne 4 étoiles pour que vous rectifiez cet impair. Merci.
translation: A good application. I recommend it to anyone who wants to read or learn the Holy Quran. Except that there is a small anomaly noted. In the repetition of verses, it happens that a part (a syllable) of the previous verse is pronounced in the following verse. I'm giving you 4 stars so you can correct this mistake. THANKS.

Review Text: 11.Dec.2023 - A new review to inform you about a little bug. When selecting multiple qaris (3) to read a sura, each aya is read 3 times (by each of the 3 qaris)...except for the last aya that is read only by the first 2 qaris. Therefore, the last aya is only recitated twice (and not thrice)....This applies to MOST but not all suras. Jazakallah khayr for this priceless app. And so so so proud that you onboarded a beautiful voice from my beloved country Senegal: SHEIKH HADY TOURE 😍

Review Text: It's a very good app. It would be great if the streak calendar was a year long but at least a month long so you have a better visual of your effort or habit development and gain more of a boost from it. If you could click on each day and see what you read that day, that would be a gold tier experience. Overall, though, I would recommend the app. Being able to customise almost everything is super helpful, and it's great if you're trying to memorise or get into reading Quran more often.
translation: It's a very good app. It would be great if the streak calendar was a year long but at least a month long so you have a better visual of your effort or habit development and gain more of a boost from it. If you could click on each day and see what you read that day, that would be a gold tier experience. Overall, though, I would recommend the app. Being able to customise almost everything is super helpful, and it's great if you're trying to memorise or get into reading Quran more often.

Review Text: This app is AMAZING. There are no ads, it is easy to navigate and whilst reading Qur'an there is a recitation button that either plays the whole surah for you, or each individual word if you are stuck on something. It also has word by word English translation written under the Arabic, as well as a full paragraph translation below that. You have the option to pause, loop and choose each individual playback word. You can bookmark and pin! Praise be to Allah. May Allah bless developers.
translation: This app is AMAZING. There are no ads, it is easy to navigate and whilst reading Qur'an there is a recitation button that either plays the whole surah for you, or each individual word if you are stuck on something. It also has word by word English translation written under the Arabic, as well as a full paragraph translation below that. You have the option to pause, loop and choose each individual playback word. You can bookmark and pin! Praise be to Allah. May Allah bless developers.

Review Text: An invaluable resource. A friendly interface allowing easy access to verses and translations. Audio feature is a standout, providing clear recitations by various qaris, enhancing the overall experience of understanding. Inclusion of multiple translations in different languages broadens accessibility. Additionally, thoughtful design and regular updates, providing a reliable platform for studying and reflecting on the teachings of the Quran. Highly recommended for user-centric Quranic experience.
translation: An invaluable resource. A friendly interface allowing easy access to verses and translations. Audio feature is a standout, providing clear recitations by various qaris, enhancing the overall experience of understanding. Inclusion of multiple translations in different languages broadens accessibility. translation: Asslam o Alaikum wa Rahmat Ullahi wa Barakatuh! Giving three stars after the last update. I'm a regular user of the app since about two years and was having a very good experience, even shared it with my fellows. But after the last update, I'm experiencing difficulties in recitation. The punctuation (اعراب) is mistaken and at many times, I feel like there are mistakes. I request the developers to please provide the correct version. Any cooperation will be highly appreciated. JazakAllah ul khyr!

Review Text: Fiturnya sungguh sangat-sangat lengkap, ada tafsiran, terjemahan, perkata audio murotal nya juga banyak, tanda tajwid, dll. Cuman pengaturan untuk mengubah ke bhs Indonesia nya kudu manual satu per satu. Kalo bisa langsung otomatis ngikutin bahasa hpnya akan lebih mudah lagi. Ga ada iklannya juga, benar-benar niat nyari pahala, dan semoga menjadi berkah untuk para pengembang aplikasi ini.
translation: The features are really very complete, there are interpretations, translations, lots of murotal audio words, recitation signs, etc. Only the settings to change to Indonesian have to be done manually one by one. If you can automatically follow the cellphone's language, it will be even easier. There are no advertisements either, the intention is really to earn a reward, and hopefully it will be a blessing for the developers of this application.

Review Text: Ara yüz güzel okumasıda fakat harflerlerin üzerindeki esreler cezimler ötreler şeddeler bazılarında yok bazılarında da belli olmuyor okumasını bilen okuyabilir ama yeni okumaya başlayan birileri için yanlış okumalarına sebebiyet verebilir bu yüzden dediklerim yapılması gerek. Kuran harfleri başka başka dillere benzemez. Bu Yüzden Kuran da ki gibi net olmalı eksik olan herşey anlamlarınında yanlış anlaşılmasına sebebiyet verir bir an önce düzeltilmeli...Allah'a Emanet Olun...
translation: The interface is good to read, but the words on the letters, inflections, vowels and tones are missing in some and not visible in others. Those who know how to read can read it, but it may cause misreading for someone who has just started reading, so what I said must be done. The letters of the Quran are not similar to any other language. That's why it should be clear as in the Quran, anything missing will cause misunderstanding of its meanings and should be corrected as soon as possible... May God bless you...

Review Text: Alhamdulillah, semoga Allah SWT memberikan umur yang panjang untuk semua tim yang terlibat dalam pembuatan aplikasi ini. Saya berharap kedepannya aplikasi ini memiliki fitur untuk mengetahui arah kiblat, jadwal sholat, dan alarm/notifikasi saat adzan. Saya juga berharap kedepannya memiliki widget jadwal sholat dan kalender hijriah.
translation: Alhamdulillah, may Allah SWT give long life to all the teams involved in making this application. I hope that in the future this application will have features to find out the direction of the Qibla, prayer schedules, and alarms/notifications during the call to prayer. I also hope that in the future there will be a prayer schedule widget and a Hijri calendar.

translation: Excellent work

Review Text: This app is so good I mean excellent for understanding, reading and reflecting on the Qur'an, and good for memorisation(hifdh). It has features where you can repeat the ayats from 1, 5,11, 19 and ♾️ infinity, 😱 this also applies to surah if you want to repeat the surah, it separates the ayats into words, with translation (any language you want it in). If you want to learn Arabic too this is good as well for building vocabulary. it has a dictionary too😱and a planner, it just keep getting better
translation: This app is so good I mean excellent for understanding, reading and reflecting on the Qur'an, and good for memorisation(hifdh). It has features where you can repeat the ayats from 1, 5,11, 19 and ♾️ infinity, 😱 this also applies to surah if you want to repeat the surah, it separates the ayats into words, with translation (any language you want it in). If you want to learn Arabic too this is good as well for building vocabulary. it has a dictionary too😱and a planner, it just keep getting better

Review Text: Terima kasih banyak sudah membuat aplikasi yang bermanfaat. Qur'an perkatanya sangat membantu, apalagi ada notifikasi surat harian, dan yang paling suka ada fitur rencana yang sangat membantu untuk mencapai target dan tau sudah sejauh apa perkembangan baca Al-Qur'an harian. Warnanya juga enak dilihat. Semoga Allah membalas kalian dengan kebaikan.
translation: Thank you very much for making a useful application. The words of the Qur'an are very helpful, especially as there are daily notifications, and what I like most is the planning feature which is very helpful for achieving targets and knowing how far you have progressed in reading the daily Qur'an. Review Text: আল কুরআন এর সবচেয়ে প্রিয় আয়াতগুলির একটি: وَاِذۡ یَمۡکُرُ بِکَ الَّذِیۡنَ کَفَرُوۡا لِیُثۡبِتُوۡکَ اَوۡ یَقۡتُلُوۡکَ اَوۡ یُخۡرِجُوۡکَ ؕ وَیَمۡکُرُوۡنَ وَیَمۡکُرُ اللّٰہُ ؕ وَاللّٰہُ خَیۡرُ الۡمٰکِرِیۡنَ অর্থঃ (হে নবী! সেই সময়কে স্মরণ কর), যখন কাফেরগণ তোমাকে বন্দী করা অথবা তোমাকে হত্যা করা কিংবা তোমাকে (দেশ থেকে) বহিষ্কার করার জন্য তোমার বিরুদ্ধে ষড়যন্ত্র করছিল। তারা তো নিজেদের ষড়যন্ত্র পাকাচ্ছিল আর আল্লাহও নিজ কৌশল প্রয়োগ করছিলেন। বস্তুত আল্লাহ সর্বাপেক্ষা শ্রেষ্ঠ কৌশলকারী। (সূরা আনফাল, ৩০)
translation: One of the most beloved verses of Al-Quran: ۡرُ الۡمٰكِرِیۡنَ Meaning: (O Prophet! Remember the time), when the disbelievers captured you or killed you or took you (the land) from) was conspiring against you to expel. They were plotting their own and Allah was using his strategy. Indeed, Allah is the best strategist. (Surah Anfal, 30)

Another awesome feature is you can click a word and can see root word and meaning, and if you further click it you find how many times this word is used in Quran, with a bonus a list of all the ayats where this word was used and the word highlited in each ayat. You can customize your experience but selecting arabic text indo pak, middle Easter etc etc

Review Text: Very difficult to navigate app. Something as simple as saving a bookmark is very long winded. I've figured out this method: Press the ayah number (which was hard to figure out anyway), press bookmark, select last read, press planner and press save progess. You then have to check if it worked! By comparison, iQuran is a dream to use. But I'm still using it everyday because I love the mushaf mode. The app needs to be simplified.
translation: Very difficult to navigate app. Something as simple as saving a bookmark is very long winded. I've figured out this method: Press the ayah number (which was hard to figure out anyway), press bookmark, select last read, press planner and press save progess. You then have to check if it worked! By comparison, iQuran is a dream to use. But I'm still using it everyday because I love the mushaf mode. The app needs to be simplified.

Review Text: I love its features and options. I was looking for a Quran app that had multiple translations, I came across this app and loved the following features: - It let's you view different translations of an ayah simultaneously. - It can simultaneously show word for word translation - The BEST feature is that you can see verb conjugations and root words of every word. - It also displays the number of times a word appears in the Quran and its different variations. Plus, it will list all those verses.
translation: I love its features and options. I was looking for a Quran app that had multiple translations, I came across this app and loved the following features: - It let's you view different translations of an ayah simultaneously. - It can simultaneously show word for word translation - The BEST feature is that you can see verb conjugations and root words of every word. - It also displays the number of times a word appears in the Quran and its different variations. Plus, it will list all those verses.

Review Text: Love this app. Good dictionary. Can choose between translators. Clean, navigatable UI. Plus no pesky ads. You can even search by topic. Say I want to see ayas about Family I tap it and it is split into many categories daughter, female, marriage, offspring etc. However, I would like to swipe navigate on the home screen instead of just tapping the icons. It would make it faster and easier, especially when one-handed. Also add a prayer timetable and Qibla as I need another app for that.
translation: Love this app. Good dictionary. Can choose between translators. Clean, navigatable UI. Plus no pesky ads. You can even search by topic. Say I want to see ayas about Family I tap it and it is split into many categories daughter, female, marriage, offspring etc. However, I would like to swipe navigate on the home screen instead of just tapping the icons. It would make it faster and easier, especially when one-handed. Also add a prayer timetable and Qibla as I need another app for that.

Review Text: L'application est très simple mais tient toutes ses promesses. Elle offre différentes options s'agissant de la lecture de Tafsir, permet l'écoute du texte coranique avec au choix plusieurs recitateurs, la traduction du texte coranique mot à mot, tout en survolant les règles générales du tajweed. Cherry on top, pas de pub et c'est gratuit. Whoever worked on this, may Allah reward you immensely, Amine.
translation: The application is very simple but keeps all its promises. It offers different options when it comes to reading Tafsir, allows you to listen to the Quranic text with a choice of several reciters, translate the Quranic text word for word, while going over the general rules of tajweed. Cherry on top, no ads and it's free. Whoever worked on this, may Allah reward you immensely, Amine.

Review Text: মা-শা-আল্লাহ অনেক সুন্দর, গোছালো এই এপ্সটি। অনেক জনের অনুবাদ এবং তাফসীর আছে। যার যে শায়েখদের অনুবাদ এবং তাফসীর ভালো লাগে সে তাদেরটা পড়তে পারে। কেউ ইচ্ছা করলে প্রত্যেক শব্দের আলাদা আলাদা ভাবে অর্থও জানতে পারে এখান থেকে, কারণ শব্দে শব্দেও অর্থ করে নেয়া যায়। নোট করার সুযোগ আছে, সুনির্দিষ্ট আয়াতের তিলাওয়াত বারবার শুনার ব্যবস্থা, পছন্দের কারীর অডিও শুনার ব্যবস্থা । আমার কাছে অনেক ভালো লাগে আলহামদুলিল্লাহ।
translation: Ma-sha-Allah, this app is very beautiful and tidy. Many have translations and commentaries. Whoever likes the translation and tafsee of the shaykhs can read them. If one wishes, one can know the meaning of each word separately from here, because the meaning can be taken from word to word. There is an opportunity to take notes, the system to listen to the recitation of specific verses repeatedly, the system to listen to the audio of the chosen one. Alhamdulillah I like it very much.

Процветания вам!
translation: Assalamu alaikum wa rahmatullahi wa barakatuh. Jazakumullah khayran to the developers for such a perfect application! Alhamdulillah! I downloaded so many different ones, but I couldn’t find the one that would contain all the functions I needed, namely, a separate listening to the reading of each verse, a translation immediately after the verse, and not poking somewhere for the translation to appear, and the page number to track, How many pages have I read at once, Subhanallah, how long have I been looking for something like this! Prosperity to you!

Review Text: تطبيق ممتاز في نظري .. هذا انطباعي القوي رغم أنني لا زلت لم أستعمله إلا ليومين فقط .. أول ملاحظة أساسية خلوه من الإشهارات والتي هي أمر مزعج عموما فما بالك في تطبيق مخصص للقرآن الكريم .. ثاني أمر جمال الخط والخلفية معا .. مع إمكانيتين هامتين تكبير وتصغير بالقدر الذي يريده القارئ والتمرير التلقائي بسرعة قابلة للتعديل .. ثالث ميزة وجود إمكانية الاختيار بين 30 قارئا .. رابعا علامات التجويد الملونة مع الشروحات .. خامسا مسألة الترجمة خصوصا إلى الانجليزية مع إمكانية التنقل بين شاشة عرض الترجمة والآيات
translation: An excellent application in my opinion. This is my strong impression, even though I have only used it for two days. The first basic note is that it is free of advertisements, which is generally annoying, let alone an application dedicated to the Holy Qur’an. The second matter is the beauty of the font and background together. With two capabilities. Two important things are zooming in and out to the extent the reader wants and automatic scrolling at an adjustable speed. The third advantage is that there is the ability to choose between 30 reciters. Fourthly, the colorful Tajweed marks with explanations. Fifthly, the issue of translation, especially into English, with the ability to move between the translation display screen and the verses.

Review Text: Wallahi I love this app so much. It has so many amazing features from dictionary, Tafsir, translation, customising Qari, Explore By Topic option, word to word Arabic translation and color coded Tajweed! And what's more! When you tap on a word, it will show you the root words, but not only that, in fact, even every spot in the Qur'an where variations of that word was used, with its accurate context. I love this app. All my loved ones have it. Alhamdulillah. May Allah bless the creators immensely.
translation: Wallahi I love this app so much. It has so many amazing features from dictionary, Tafsir, translation, customising Qari, Explore By Topic option, word to word Arabic translation and color coded Tajweed! And what's more! When you tap on a word, it will show you the root words, but not only that, in fact, even every spot in the Qur'an where variations of that word was used, with its accurate context. I love this app. All my loved ones have it. Alhamdulillah. May Allah bless the creators immensely.

Review Text: One of the best Qur'an apps so far available. Appreciate the ad-free effort. Have been using it for at least 4 years+. Pros.: Simple but skillfull controls. Nice and simple UI. Deep meanings of Quranic words. Variety of themes available. Advanced bookmarking. Cons. (Bugs and suggestions): When you play an ayat, it goes into an error and plays another one or exits. Confusing 'Auto Scroll' statistics. Variety of fonts available which are not available on most other Quran apps.
translation: One of the best Qur'an apps so far available. Appreciate the ad-free effort. Have been using it for at least 4 years+. Pros.: Simple but skillfull controls. Nice and simple UI. Deep meanings of Quranic words. Variety of themes available. Advanced bookmarking. Cons. (Bugs and suggestions): When you play an ayat, it goes into an error and plays another one or exits. Confusing 'Auto Scroll' statistics. Variety of fonts available which are not available on most other Quran apps.

However, I have a suggestion for the developers: adding a widget for smartphones. Please consider this addition; it would undoubtedly elevate the app to another level of usability and accessibility.

May Allah continuously reward you for your hard work, while we use this & beyond

Review Text: এই অ্যাপটা আমার খুবই পছন্দ হয়েছে এখানে আমি খুব তথ্যবহুল ইনফর্মেশন পাচ্ছি এবং প্রয়োজন পড়লেই কোরআনের বাংলা দেখে নিতে পারছি। আমার একবন্ধু আরবী পারেনা তাই সে কোরআন ও পরে না। নামাজের জন্য অবশ্য কিছু সূরা তার মুখস্ত তবে বর্তমানে এই অ্যাপের সাহায্যে কোরআনের বাংলা পরে। আমি এই অ্যাপ ব্যবহার করে সন্তুষ্ট। ধন্যবাদ আপনাদের এত সুন্দর অ্যাপ তৈরির জন্য।

A friend of mine doesn't know Arabic so he doesn't even read the Quran. Review Text: Worse and worse every update. The bookmark bug hasn't been addressed in over a year which tell me these guys don't actually use their own app. This last update messed up night mode so now the text is light gray on a white background in night mode making it unreadable. The work around us to toggle the settings manually but this only lasts until the app closes. Also they keep showing popups trying to get me to sign up and donate to them. Fix the app first.
translation: Worse and worse every update. The bookmark bug hasn't been addressed in over a year which tell me these guys don't actually use their own app. This last update messed up night mode so now the text is light gray on a white background in night mode making it unreadable. The work around us to toggle the settings manually but this only lasts until the app closes. Also they keep showing popups trying to get me to sign up and donate to them. Fix the app first.
Developer Reply Text: Assalamu 'alaykum brother, we are sorry for the inconvenience. We have solved the problem with the dark theme. Please update to our latest version v1.24.1. Regarding the bookmark bug, can you kindly share more details? It will help us to troubleshoot and resolve the bug in sha Allah. Barakallahu feekum.

Review Text: Super, läuft einwandfrei, intuitiv zu bedienen, sehr umfangreiche Funktionen. Im Alltag (wenn man unterwegs ist) sehr praktisch, v.a. die Downloadfunktion der Suren. Damit funktioniert diese App vollkommen offline, sofern man vorher einmalig die Suren heruntergeladen hat. Ebenso gefallen mir auch die Fußnoten mit weiteren Erklärungen, wenn bestimmte Passagen für mich sonst nicht eindeutig wären.
translation: Great, runs perfectly, intuitive to use, very extensive functions. Very practical in everyday life (when you're on the go), especially the download function of the surahs. This means that this app works completely offline, as long as you have downloaded the surahs once beforehand. I also like the footnotes with further explanations if certain passages would otherwise not be clear to me.

Review Text: Amazing app for Muslims People. এই রকম একটি কুরআন এপস্ সকল মুসলিম ভাইদের মোবাইলে থাকা দরকার। শব্দে শব্দে কুরআন, সিমিলার শব্দ খোজ করা ইত্যাদি যা যা একজন কুরআনের জ্ঞানপিপাসু জন্য প্রয়োজন তা সবই আছে। আমি এ এপস্ ছাড়া মোবাইল চালানোর কথা চিন্তা করি না। আর কোন এপস্ থাকুক বা না থাকুক Al Quran (Tafsir & by Word) আমার চাই চাই। পরিশেষে আমি বলতে চাই আমি প্রতিদিন কুরআন শিখছি সাথে আমাদের বাংলা ভাষায় কুরআনের মানে জানতে পারছি।
translation: Amazing app for Muslim People. A Quran app like this is a must have for all Muslim brothers in their mobiles. Word-by-word Quran, search for similar words, etc. are all that a Quran lover needs. I don't think of running a mobile without these apps. I want Al Quran (Tafsir & by Word) whether there is any app or not. Finally I want to say that I am learning Quran every day and knowing the meaning of Quran in our Bengali language.

Review Text: Ас-Саляму 'алейкум уа рохматуЛлаhи уа барокатуh. Очень нравится это приложение. Къур'ан всегда под рукой. Можно сделать закладку, там где остановился, это выручает. translation: As-Salamu 'alaikum wa rokhmatullahi wa barokatuh. I really like this app. Qur'an is always at hand. You can make a bookmark where you left off, it helps. One wish: It would be nice if donations could be made through some Russian services. Update: there are some problems with bookmarks. Sometimes they double up, and sometimes they disappear altogether, and if you can’t remember where you finished reading, you’ll have to start over again..

Review Text: Ассаляму аллейкум уа рохматулЛахи уа баракатух. Ма шаа Аллах. ДжазакАллаху хайрон. С удовольствием пользуюсь и всем советую. Уважаемые разработчики, у меня к вам просьба. Посмотрите аят 255/2 Аль-Курси. Озвучивает Хусари. Запись пропадает вначале на слове Аллах субхана уа Та-Аля и читает уля ,вместо Аллаху ля иляха...И чуть дальше на этой строчке исчезает звук и переходит на кайюм.-окончание предложения.И начало аята 286/2 пропадает звук.Очень прошу исправьте или подскажите может что не так.
translation: Assalamu aleikum wa rohmatullahi wa barakatuh. Masha Allah. JazakAllahu khayron. I use it with pleasure and recommend it to everyone. Dear developers, I have a request to ask you. Look at verse 255/2 Al-Kursi. Voiced by Husari. The recording disappears at the beginning on the word Allah subhana wa Ta-Ala and reads ula, instead of Allahu la ilaha... And a little further on this line the sound disappears and goes to qayyum - the end of the sentence. And the beginning of verse 286/2 the sound disappears. I beg you fix it or tell me what might be wrong.

Since when did I give you time to study today, for example, where in the verse is the word hypocrite used, did you call yourself hypocrite? Don't we have Surah Monafiqoon? You only bring an approved language and translator, this is not an art, you bring 200 translators, I have to use your program to make...

I'm just surprised that the apk is getting bigger, when I just downloaded it it was only 90MB. But recently I checked 770MB. Is my cellphone the problem, please explain 🙏

Review Text: আলহামদুলিল্লাহ খুবই সুন্দর অ্যাপ। আমার পছন্দ হয়েছে। আল্লাহ সুবহানাহু তাআলা আপনাদের উপযুক্ত বদলা দান করুন। তবে কুইক লিঙ্কে হুজুরে পাক মুহাম্মাদ সল্লাল্লাহু আলাইহি ওয়া সাল্লাম এর নিয়মিত পঠিত সূরা সমূহ দিলে আরো ভালো হত। সংকলনে আয়াত সমূহের শিরোনাম দেয়া যায় কিনা একটু বিবেচনায় নিবেন, যাতে পাঠকগণ বুঝতে পারেন আয়াত সমূহ কি সংক্রান্ত। মহান আল্লাহ রব্বুল আলামীন যেন আমাদেরকে এই পবিত্র কুরআন নিয়মিত পড়া, বোঝা ও আমল করার তাওফিক দান করেন।
translation: Alhamdulillah very nice app. i liked May Allah Subhanahu Taala give you a suitable reward. However, it would have been better to provide regularly recited Surahs of Holy Prophet Muhammad sallallahu alaihi wa sallam in the quick link. Consider giving the titles of the verses in the compilation so that readers can understand what the verses are about. May Almighty Allah Almighty grant us Tawfiq to read, understand and practice this Holy Quran regularly.

Review Text: قال صلى الله عليه وآله وسلم: ما من مؤمن ذكر أو أنثى حر أو مملوك إلاّ ولله عليه حق، واجب أن يتعلم من القرآن ويتفقه فيه.. ثم قرأ هذه الآية: وَلَـكِن كُونُواْ رَبَّانِيِّينَ بِمَا كُنتُمْ تُعَلِّمُونَ الْكِتَاب. وقال صلى الله عليه وآله وسلم: خياركم من تعلم القرآن وعلّمه.
translation: He, may God’s prayers and peace be upon him and his family, said: There is no believer, male or female, free or owned, except that God has a right over him, and it is an obligation for him to learn from the Qur’an and understand it. Then he recited this verse: But be rabbinic in what you teach the Book. And he, may God’s prayers and peace be upon him and his family, said: The best of you is the one who learns and teaches the Qur’an.
